nodes.text: Omega's Room was a room reserved for the enhanced clone Omega in the Havoc Marauder, an Omicron-class attack shuttle that served as the personal starship of Clone Force 99. It was originally a gunner's nest accessible by ladder near the back of the ship, until the clone commando known as "Wrecker" renovated it, making it suitable for a child to live in. It was decorated with lights, a curtain, a bed, and Wrecker's doll Lula.

Omega, who had never owned her own room during her time on Kamino, accepted Wrecker's gift. The leader of Clone Force 99, "Hunter," assured Omega that she was part of their squad, and would therefore have a space of her own on board their starship.
